citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:15 p.m on
11/23/2015.
Spoke with the owner by phone, he was unable to be present that day for the inspection. Owner gave optimal hours
for availability.
Additional Inspectors
Moore Chad, Animal Care Inspector
